name: Chinese Folk Dance
description: Learn the fundamentals for Chinese folk dance including native traditional Chinese dance and international folk dances. Lessons will focus on learning basic steps while improving balance and strength. Please wear comfortable shoes and clothing.
fullDescription: Learn the fundamentals for Chinese folk dance including native traditional Chinese dance and international folk dances. Lessons will focus on learning basic steps while improving balance and strength. Please wear comfortable shoes and clothing.
whatTheyOffer: Learn the fundamentals for Chinese folk dance including native traditional Chinese dance and international folk dances. Lessons will focus on learning basic steps while improving balance and strength. Please wear comfortable shoes and clothing.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
